title: Beginner's Survival Guide
author: Wiki Team
description: Essential tips and strategies for new players. Learn the basics of surviving your first night.

content.text: When you first spawn in the mega store, your priority should be finding a light source. The store is pitch black after closing, and you'll need to see where you're going.
Always prioritize finding these items: Flashlight, First Aid Kit, Water Bottle, and a Weapon. These are your basic survival tools.
Don't waste consumables on minor injuries. Save your First Aid Kits for emergencies. Energy Drinks should be used strategically when you need to run or explore quickly.
If you hear footsteps or see movement, hide immediately. Use shelves and displays as cover. Running should be your last resort as it makes noise and attracts attention.
The night lasts from 10:00 PM to 6:00 AM (8 hours in-game). Plan your activities accordingly. Don't spend too much time in one area.

title: Advanced Survival Strategies
author: Pro Player
description: Master-level strategies for experienced players. Optimize your survival rate and maximize rewards.

content.text: Plan your route before starting. The most efficient path is: Security Office → Pharmacy → Electronics → Generator Room. This minimizes backtracking.
Legendary items should always be your first priority. Master Key and Night Vision Goggles are game-changers. Don't waste time on common items unless you need them immediately.
Enemies follow predictable patrol routes. Learn these patterns and time your movements accordingly. Most enemies have a 2-minute patrol cycle.
Collect everything you can early on, but don't carry too much. Use the Tactical Backpack to increase capacity. Drop common items if you find better ones.
For speed runs, focus only on main quest items. Skip side quests unless they're on your path. Use Energy Drinks to maintain sprint speed.

title: Enemy Encounter Guide
author: Survivor Expert
description: Learn how to deal with different enemy types and avoid dangerous encounters.

content.text: Patrol in pairs, have flashlights. Hide when you see their light. They can be distracted with noise from walkie-talkies.
Only appear in complete darkness. Always carry a light source. They're weak to bright light from flashlights.
Boss enemy that appears after 2:00 AM. Extremely dangerous. Best strategy is to avoid entirely or use all your resources to defeat.
Use shelves as cover, crouch to reduce noise, use distractions (throw items), and always have an escape route planned.
If combat is unavoidable, use weapons with knockback (baseball bat). Fire extinguisher can blind enemies temporarily. Always have a First Aid Kit ready.

title: Complete Quest Walkthrough
author: Wiki Team
description: Step-by-step walkthrough for all main and side quests. Never get stuck again!

content.text: Recommended order: First Night → Pharmacy Run → Security Breach → Weapon Master → Power Restoration → Escape Route → The Final Night
Start by heading to Electronics (Aisle 12) for flashlight. Then go to Customer Service for store map. Finally, locate emergency exit near main entrance.
First, get Security Badge from Lost & Found. Use it to access security room. Disable cameras using the code from Manager's Office. Then grab Master Key.
Find Generator Fuel in Automotive Section. Go to Basement (use Master Key). Activate generator. Survive the 30-second power surge event with enemies spawning.
Stock up on all consumables. Have Master Key, Night Vision Goggles, and all weapons. Plan your route and stick to it. Don't explore unnecessarily.
